proposal: Hey GROKI community, blending the charm of memes with the power of AI like you do is truly a unique twist in the crypto space! 🚀 With 62 holders on the ETH network already, you're clearly onto something special. Imagine enhancing this journey with your own DEX or engaging the community further through a blockchain-based lottery. Let's make crypto not just revolutionary but also fun for everyone involved. How about we add some of our tools to your arsenal?
